info.help_text:
Rejected calls observation report.

This report shows the total sum of rejected service requests at the ticket service of all the signalling units of the exchange regardless of the computer units being observed.

The DX200/ATCA system contains load control mechanisms which include message queue observation and access window method. Rejected calls observation requires that one of the computer units CCSU, TGSU, SIGU CASU, PAU, BSU, BDCU, or GSU is under observation.

In the Open MSS, which is based on the ATCA hardware, the only possible signaling unit type is the Generic Signaling Unit (GISU).

Object levels:
PLMN->MSC

Measurements:
M114: Rejected calls observation measurement
